trans-unit.resname: EVE·1 | Archon of Justice | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: In dark times, Truth bears a blade.
trans-unit.target: 在黑暗时代，真理得配剑出巡。

trans-unit.source: Ballynock Trapper
trans-unit.target: 巴立纳布陷人

trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a white spell, you may untap Ballynock Trapper.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用一个白色咒语时，你可以重置巴立纳布陷人。

trans-unit.source: No matter how large or small, fierce or fleeting, the kithkin have a trap for it.
trans-unit.target: 不论高大或细小、凶蛮或迅捷，洁英都有足以应付的陷阱。

trans-unit.source: Cenn's Enlistment
trans-unit.target: 仕绅徵兵

trans-unit.target: 将两个1/1白色洁英／士兵衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.resname: EVE·3 | Cenn's Enlistment | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Retrace (You may play this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
trans-unit.target: 追溯 （你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，但必须支付其所需费用，并额外弃掉一张地牌。）

trans-unit.source: The more the scarier.

trans-unit.source: Endless Horizons
trans-unit.target: 无垠地平线

trans-unit.resname: EVE·4 | Endless Horizons | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Endless Horizons comes into play, search your library for any number of Plains cards and remove them from the game. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当无垠地平线进场时，从你的牌库中搜寻任意数量的平原牌，并将它们移出对战。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: EVE·4 | Endless Horizons | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a card you own removed from the game with Endless Horizons into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以将一张由你拥有、且以无垠地平线移出对战之牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.source: Endure
trans-unit.target: 忍耐

trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and permanents you control this turn.
trans-unit.target: 于本回合中，防止将对你与由你操控之永久物造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.source: The Aurora had lessened the kithkins' kindness, deepened their paranoia, and dulled their sense of pain.
trans-unit.target: 极光降临，消磨了洁英之仁心，加深其偏执，滞钝其痛觉。

trans-unit.source: Its wings disturb more than air.
trans-unit.target: 其翅翼比所卷起的气流更扰乱人心。

trans-unit.source: "I'd rather hear the screams of battle than the quiet that follows."\n—Talara, elvish safewright

trans-unit.resname: EVE·10 | Light from Within | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Muscle does not make one strong. It only masks the soul's light. True strength lies in purity of purpose."\n—Donal Alloway, cenn of Kinscaer
trans-unit.target: 「肌肉不会让人变强， 它只会遮蔽灵魂的光芒。 真实的力量藏在纯净信念里。」 ～英刹园仕绅唐诺·欧洛威

trans-unit.target: 就算是听觉灵敏的波葛，也经常躲不过高明安排又毫无声息的洁英突袭。

For each blue mana symbol in the mana costs of the revealed cards, target opponent puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Then put the cards you revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.

trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张地牌，便将一个1/1，黑绿双色的蠕虫衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Battlegate Mimic

trans-unit.source: Mimics don't need perfect disguises. They need only the perfect victims: the naive, the young, or the poor of sight.
trans-unit.target: 拟态妖不需要完美的伪装。 他们只需要完美的对象：天真，年轻，或者视力不太好的。

trans-unit.source: "When in doubt, kill 'em twice."
trans-unit.target: 「如果不放心，就连杀两次。」

trans-unit.source: Duergar Assailant

trans-unit.source: Some duergars dismiss the world above as a fable. They react violently when their comfortable illusions are dispelled.
trans-unit.target: 有些垛格只把顶上的世界当成寓言故事。 当心中自满的幻象给打破时，便会以暴力反应。

trans-unit.target: 垛格是好记性的高明工人， 有些能够完成数十甚或数百年前所交付的精细复杂任务。

trans-unit.resname: EVE·140 | Fire at Will | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 任意射击

trans-unit.target: 任意射击造成3点伤害，你可任意分配于任意数量之目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物上。

trans-unit.resname: EVE·140 | Fire at Will | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Make these shots count. The more foes we drop now, the fewer we'll have trying to kill us later."
trans-unit.target: 「别射偏了。 我们现在射倒的敌人越多，等下想杀我们的就越少。」

trans-unit.source: Hearthfire Hobgoblin
trans-unit.target: 锻火大精灵

trans-unit.source: Double strike
trans-unit.target: 连击

trans-unit.source: Hobgoblins are best left alone. They sharpen their farm implements far more than is necessary for their work in the fields.
trans-unit.target: 最好别招惹大精灵， 他们把庄稼工具打磨得比田间工作所需的程度还要更锋利。

trans-unit.target: 大精灵重装兵

trans-unit.target: 飞行，先攻

trans-unit.source: The faeries snickered at first. A common hob in Oona's skies? But his lance ended their mockery, and now the sound of a cicada's wings brings a shudder to the faerie heart.
trans-unit.target: 仙灵原先还在窃笑。 毫不起眼的大精灵竟敢冒犯欧娜领空？ 但他以长枪让嘲弄就此结束，蝉翼扬起的风声从此让仙灵为之心颤。

trans-unit.source: Enlightenment is the mundane seen from the vantage point of the divine.

trans-unit.source: Gilder Bairn

trans-unit.source: {2}{GW}, {Q}: For each counter on target permanent, put another of those counters on that permanent. ({Q} is the untap symbol.)

trans-unit.source: Do the glowing trinkets show it the way home, or do they set a twisted path for someone else to follow?
trans-unit.target: 这些闪亮玩意究竟是来指引他回家的路，或是要让追迹者迷失方向？

trans-unit.source: Endry was determined to teach his groundlings a few winged-faerie tricks.

trans-unit.target: 不凡神人

trans-unit.source: Slippery Bogle can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: 油滑波葛不能成为由对手所操控之咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: Bogles are very tasty if you can get the skin off. It's getting a blade on them that's the problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果能把皮给剥掉，波葛非常美味； 而问题是很难让刀锋碰上去。

trans-unit.source: Snakeform
trans-unit.target: 蛇化术

trans-unit.source: Target creature loses all abilities and becomes a 1/1 green Snake until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物失去所有异能，并成为1/1绿色蛇。

trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Losing his possessions distressed him, but the lack of limbs was strangely liberating.
trans-unit.target: 身体无法自主使他痛苦万分，但失去四肢的他却感到异常地轻松自在。

trans-unit.source: Spitting Image
trans-unit.target: 射影

trans-unit.resname: EVE·162 | Spitting Image | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put a token into play that's a copy of target creature.
trans-unit.target: 将一个衍生物放置进场，此衍生物为目标生物之复制。

trans-unit.resname: EVE·162 | Spitting Image | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Retrace (You may play this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)
trans-unit.target: 追溯 （你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，但必须支付其所需费用，并额外弃掉一张地牌。）

trans-unit.source: Spitting is the customary greeting between a creature and its magical impostor.
trans-unit.target: 生物碰上自己的法术假冒品时，通常会行互射口水之礼。

trans-unit.target: 强固幼雏

trans-unit.target: 每当你使用一个绿色咒语时，从强固幼雏上移去一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.target: 每当你使用一个蓝色咒语时，从强固幼雏上移去一个-1/-1指示物。

trans-unit.target: 留存 （当此生物从场上置入坟墓场时，若其上没有-1/-1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回场上，且其上有一个-1/-1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Travelers in these waters leave a bit of themselves behind.
trans-unit.target: 涉足这水域的旅者，会把自己的一部分留下来。

trans-unit.source: Wistful Selkie
trans-unit.target: 渴求海豹妖

trans-unit.source: When Wistful Selkie comes into play, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当渴求海豹妖进场时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Selkies call to a sea they never swam, in a tongue they never spoke, with a song they never learned.
trans-unit.target: 海豹妖唱从未学过的歌曲，以从未用过的口音，呼唤着从未徜徉的大海。

trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.target: 祭坛魔像的力量和防御力各等同于场上生物的数量。

trans-unit.source: Altar Golem doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 祭坛魔像于其操控者的重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.target: 横置五个由你操控的未横置生物：重置祭坛魔像。

trans-unit.source: Antler Skulkin
trans-unit.target: 鹿角颅身

trans-unit.source: {2}: Target white creature gains persist until end of turn. (When it's put into a graveyard from play, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to play under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: {2}：目标白色生物获得留存异能直到回合结束。 （当它从场上置入坟墓场时，若其上没有-1/-1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回场上，且其上有一个-1/-1指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Every skull has a tale to tell, and a skulkin is many dire tales cobbled together.
trans-unit.target: 每个颅骨都有段故事，而颅身正是许多悲惨故事的拼凑成品。

trans-unit.source: Fang Skulkin

trans-unit.source: "Everything falls apart. But living things fall apart in the most fascinating ways."\n—Mowagh the Gwyllion
trans-unit.target: 「万物的形体终将散裂。 但活物形体散裂开的方法最为奇妙。」 ～山妪墨娃

trans-unit.source: It hunts with the memory of a long lost herd.
trans-unit.target: 它依照早已消失的一群之残留记忆行猎。

trans-unit.source: Jawbone Skulkin
trans-unit.target: 嘴骨颅身

trans-unit.target: {2}：目标红色生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Ah, skull of shrew—a very potent substance. In powdered form, it gives thrice the zing of noggle hoof pulp."\n—Boghald, Barrenton medic
trans-unit.target: 「啊，地鼠的头颅～这东西用处很大。 磨成粉之后，它提供的运动效力比诺格蹄髓还要强三倍。」 ～八连屯医护员伯豪

trans-unit.source: Equip {2}
trans-unit.target: 佩带{2}

trans-unit.source: The banner was not a symbol of victory, but a herald of the carnage to come.

trans-unit.source: Her poppets bring joy to the truly depraved.

trans-unit.target: 骨骸守护

trans-unit.target: 所操控之生物数量比你多的对手均不能使用生物牌； 且神器，结界，以及地亦比照办理。

trans-unit.source: Mages dare not attempt magic in its grotesque presence.
trans-unit.target: 这怪诞造物让法师不敢轻试法术。

trans-unit.source: "Do not linger in such places, child. There the gwyllions dance. If they find you, you will join in their revels for eternity."\n—Talara, elvish safewright
trans-unit.target: 「孩子，别到这种地方逗留。 山妪在此狂舞， 如果给她们发现，就永远无法脱离这场欢宴。」 ～地精美境卫塔萝拉
